Projects & Professional Experiences

Results-driven Software Developer with strong expertise in building scalable applications using Java, Spring Boot, and modern web technologies. Experienced in developing RESTful microservices, automating test workflows with Selenium, and designing end-to-end integration solutions using SnapLogic and Mulesoft. Proven ability to lead backend development for enterprise-grade systems such as Guidewire PolicyCenter, including form customization and document generation with Thunderhead. Adept at full software development lifecycle (SDLC), from requirement analysis to deployment and maintenance. Passionate about clean code, performance optimization, and cross-functional collaboration.
